name: tokiforge
description: Framework-agnostic design token and theming engine for React, Vue, Svelte, Angular. Runtime theme switching, CSS variables, smart color utilities. <3KB gzipped.

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:rest
scripts.docs:dev: cd docs && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && npm install && npm run build
scripts.link:all: npm run link:core && npm run link:react && npm run link:vue && npm run link:svelte && npm run link:angular && npm run link:cli
scripts.link:react: cd packages/react && npm link && npm link @tokiforge/core
scripts.link:vue: cd packages/vue && npm link && npm link @tokiforge/core
scripts.link:svelte: cd packages/svelte && npm link && npm link @tokiforge/core
scripts.link:angular: cd packages/angular && npm link && npm link @tokiforge/core
scripts.install:global: cd packages/cli && npm run build && npm install -g .
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:core && npm run publish:react && npm run publish:vue && npm run publish:svelte && npm run publish:angular && npm run publish:cli

author: TokiForge Community
